forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 64F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.
